description:
Pill Identifier application is capable to search more than 10,000 Rx/OTC medications found in the U.S. and other countries.
    By using this application you can search pill by name or Imprint or Color or shape or combination of above.
    By resultant this application will show you the Drug name, RX name(which includes drug strength and RX name), size, color, shape, scoring, FDA Product code, NDC Code, DES schedule and author of the pill.
    Using this app you can find the pill information very fast easily.
    The database is regularly updated.



Features:-

    Search pill by name or Imprint or Color or shape or combination of above.
    By using this app you can find all related health information very easily.
    This application can able to search more than 10,000 pills.



Disclaimer:
This application does not provide you medical or treatment advice. Please consult with a physician before taking any medicine or Pill or Drug.
